InstaDeep has been named among the Top 100 global AI startups for three consecutive years by CB Insights, as well as one of the 100 most promising B2B companies in Europe, by Sifted. We have created an environment that ensures a challenge by working closely with a broad spectrum of high-quality clients, pushing you to thrive in an environment that’s rarely tedious and always looking to push you to come up with outside-the-box solutions using cutting-edge technologies. In our mission to stay ahead of the curve, we are proud to partner with firms such as BioNTech SE, Google DeepMind, NVIDIA and Intel, and world-class universities such as MIT, Oxford, UCL, and Imperial College London. We are also an NVIDIA Elite Service Delivery Partner and Google Cloud Partner.Job DescriptionInstaDeep is looking for an experienced Research Scientist to join our expanding Research team in Cape Town. The research focus of the team is on generalist systems including aspects of reinforcement learning, meta-learning and foundation models. In this role, a particular focus will be on the development of novel research within the aforementioned fields applied to biological systems. Our efforts within this context are towards developing valuable research works and breakthroughs in generalist AI applied to biology that were previously out of reach.As a Research Scientist in Science, you’ll be a part of the Research Team, working on some of the most challenging areas of computational biology (such as drug design, protein folding, and molecular property prediction) using artificial intelligence. The role of a Research Scientist is to help shape and drive our ambitious research agenda, to publish in leading journals and at conferences, and to support InstaDeep’s applied BioAI projects. Individuals in this role are expected to be accomplished in computational biology and machine learning, with demonstrated expertise in at least one area evidenced by relevant academic/industrial experience or publications.We welcome applications from any background and foster an open and accepting environment. InstaDeepers are naturally helpful people who want to help others grow and succeed. We strongly encourage and support applications from underrepresented groups in the tech industry .Responsibilities Collaborate with other researchers and domain experts to develop machine-learning methods for problems in computational biology.  Lead a team of researchers and engineers in solving analytical problems using quantitative approaches.  Contribute to the design and implementation of models, tools and libraries to accelerate our research effort.  Adapt neural network algorithms to deploy on supercomputing architectures to best exploit modern parallel environments.  Report and present experimental results and research findings clearly and effectively, both internally and externally, verbally and in writing.  Contribute to the team’s publication efforts.  Bridge the gap between the research and product teams by integrating new fundamental research into applied projects. Requirements Work permit for South Africa.  PhD. degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning or a related field.  A demonstrated ability to successfully deliver high-quality research, for example through the publication of scientific papers in journals or conferences.  Experience using Deep Learning frameworks such as PyTorch, Tensorflow and/or Jax.  Experience in developing and debugging in Python or similar languages.  Excellent communication skills and collaborative spirit. Nice-To-Haves 2-5 years of industrial research experience with a focus on leading a team in solving analytical problems using quantitative approaches.  Reinforcement Learning, Meta-Learning, and/or Natural Language Processing expertise.  Structural biology or molecular dynamics experience. Benefits Competitive salary.  Work in small, diverse teams on collaborative research where you can make an impact.  Cooperation across European, UK, US and African offices  Flexible working hours.  Supportive atmosphere and unique opportunities to grow, learn and contribute to the larger research community. Our Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion commitmentsAt InstaDeep, we empower individuals to celebrate their uniqueness. Our team comes from all walks of life, and we highly encourage and support applicants to apply from underrepresented groups. Our commitment to creating an authentic environment comes from our ability to learn and grow from our diversity.At present we operate in a hybrid way allowing work from home or work from the office as per each individual’s preferences. We are continuing to review the situation with the well-being of InstaDeepers at the forefront of our minds.Right to work : Please note you will require the legal right to work in the location you are applying for. Any further questions please do not hesitate to contact us at: talent@instadeep.comExamples of our research at the intersection of AI and biology Designing a Prospective COVID-19 Therapeutic with Reinforcement Learning  Peptide-MHC Structure Prediction With Mixed Residue and Atom Graph Neural Network  ManyFold: an efficient and flexible library for training and validating protein folding models  Early Computational Detection of Potential High Risk SARS-CoV-2 Variants
